bike.description: FACT 11m carbon front triangle, SWAT EMT tool cradle, 29" World Cup geometry, FACT IS construction, full FACT carbon rear triangle, World Cup mega-chainstays, single ring only, tapered headtube, carbon PF30 BB, full internal shift/brake routing, 142mm dropouts, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 95mm
